name: crypto-dashboard-package
description: 虛擬貨幣分析儀表板 - 完整項目包

scripts.install-backend: cd crypto-api && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev-backend: cd crypto-api && source venv/bin/activate && python src/main.py
scripts.deploy: cd crypto-dashboard && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../crypto-api/src/static/
scripts.start: cd crypto-api && source venv/bin/activate && python src/main.py

author: Your Name
